content:
I think that's a great plan. I'll make sure to keep my tweets concise and visually appealing, and to use relevant hashtags to increase discoverability. I'll also try to ask questions or ask for feedback to encourage engagement and start conversations with my audience.

One thing I'm also thinking of doing is sharing some behind-the-scenes content on my Instagram stories, maybe some sneak peeks of new products or features I'm working on. Do you think that would be a good idea, or should I focus on Twitter for now?
